channel.title: CVE Feed for Talos -- GOG Galaxy
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Talos -- GOG Galaxy

item.title: CVE-2018-4050|2024-08-05T05:04:29.151Z -- talos -- gog%20galaxy
item.description: An exploitable local privilege escalation vulnerability exists in the privileged helper tool of GOG Galaxy's Games, version 1.2.47 for macOS. An attacker can globally adjust folder permissions leading to execution of arbitrary code with elevated privileges.

item.title: CVE-2018-4048|2024-08-05T05:04:29.440Z -- talos -- gog%20galaxy
item.description: An exploitable local privilege elevation vulnerability exists in the file system permissions of the `Temp` directory in GOG Galaxy 1.2.48.36 (Windows 64-bit Installer). An attacker can overwrite executables of the Desktop Galaxy Updater to exploit this vulnerability and execute arbitrary code with SYSTEM privileges.
